Question: This person parted ways with Methods of Mayhem partner TiLo and began recording with members of Incubus.
Hints: This person was cleared by a jury in April 2003.
Although **** distanced himself from Mötley Crüe after splitting, he agreed to take part in their 2001 autobiography, The Dirt.
With the popularity of rap metal, this person formed a band called Methods of Mayhem.
